description: Nov. 2022 - delivered a talk on Data Analysis in Io(B)T at a DRDO Sponsored One Week Workshop On 'Blockchain Assisted Secured Data Analytics In Internet Of Battlefield Things (ioBt)'
Nov. 2023 - delivered a talk on AI in IoT at a ATAL Sponsored Faculty Development Programme on (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for Industrial Internet of Things 5.0)
